api_list.name: Popular
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheap-youtube-api.p.rapidapi.com/popular"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheap-youtube-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search suggestions
api_list.description:
Get search suggestions for a query

example: 
/search/suggestions?q=crypto

api_list.name: Trending (music, gaming, news, movies)
api_list.description:
Get trending videos.

Optional parameters:
type: "music", "gaming", "news", "movies"
region: ISO 3166 country code (default: "US")

api_list.name: Search
Playlist
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheap-youtube-api.p.rapidapi.com/playlists/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheap-youtube-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Comments
api_list.description:
**Get comments from a video**
example: /comments/dQw4w9WgXcQ

**Parameters**
sort_by: "top", "new" (default: top)
